song.eTitle: God in His Love for Us

verses.verse: God in His love for us lent us this planet, Gave it a purpose in time and in space: Small as a spark from the fire of creation, Cradle of life and the home of our race.
Thanks be to God for its bounty and beauty, Life that sustains us in body and mind: Plenty for all, if we learn how to share it, Riches undreamed of to fathom and find.
Earth is the Lord's: it is ours to enjoy it, Ours, as His stewards, to farm and defend. From its pollution, misuse, and destruction, Good Lord, deliver us, world without end!
